content.raw:
Regarding the missing sending_logs state , I think it is because it is being overwritten at cloudsim-sim level before it is even sent back to portal. 
This happens when subsequent events are so fast that override (using underscore's extend) cloudsim-sim current/last event before it is sent . From the UI point of view, this should not affect your work.
content.html: Regarding the missing sending_logs state , I think it is because it is being overwritten at cloudsim-sim level before it is even sent back to portal. This happens when subsequent events are so fast that override (using underscore's extend) cloudsim-sim current/last event before it is sent . From the UI point of view, this should not affect your work.
